name: SocialConnectionInterventionsSNOMEDCT
title: Social Connection Interventions SNOMED CT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represent interventions for Social Connection as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Data Element Scope: In the FHIR Procedure and ServiceRequest resources, these values may be used for Procedure.code and ServiceRequest.code (e.g., for the SDOHCC Procedure and ServiceRequest profiles in the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide).),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMED CT interventions for Social Connection as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes codes included in the "Cross-Domains Interventions SNOMED CT" Value Set.)
